description:
This course is mainly for people who would like to learn more about the new features that were introduced in Pro Tools®10.

You need to have a basic understanding of Pro Tools® to be able to follow the pace.

This course also has a bonus section at the end, which covers:

1) the proper way of routing a real time reverb plug-in in your mix,

2) how to use automation in virtual instruments

3) two different 'bouncing to disk' methods.

I hope you'll enjoy this tapas course as much as I enjoyed developing it.
title: A Pro Tools gourmet training
